job_description:
• Master’s degree in Robotics, Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or a related industrial experince.
• Basic programming skills in C++ or Python.
• Experience with real-time Linux.
• Embedded programming experience (C for microcontrollers, sensor/actuator interfacing).
• Experience in building, running, and documenting hardware test setups.
• Experience with robotics projects outside of coursework (e.
• Excellent engineering skills and practices.
• You’ll be among the first engineers to validate how new hardware and control systems perform in practice, directly influencing design improvements and refinements.
